title: Detox Foods - Fruit Salad
content:
Detox foods should be included in one's diet. Our system needs to be cleansed and rested at regular intervals. Going on a fruit diet is good to detox the body. I follow the detox diet every now and then and should make it a regular part of my diet regime.

Fruit SaladDetox Foods - Fruit

Detoxifying today with a fruit salad tossed in ayurvedic powder. The fruits used are papaya, apple and orange with a dash of chaat masala and a tsp of ayurvedic powder which is very good for digestion and detoxifying the body.
